member.name: T:Emergent.Toolbench.SimDebugger.Launcher.NotifyFrameworkLoad
member.summary: Sentinel class that delays loading the Sim Debugger until a game connects.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.SimDebugger.Launcher.NotifyFrameworkLoad.OnNotify(System.Object,Emergent.Toolbench.NotificationEventArgs)
member.summary: Notification handler triggered by the load of the Framework plug-in.

member.name: M:Emergent.Toolbench.SimDebugger.Launcher.NotifyFrameworkLoad.OnAppConnected(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Called when an app connection is established.
member.param: Addition data about the connected app.
